New: Surface-snapped point plotting: points snap to whatever surface you're aiming at, with a live cursor preview
Mid-air point placement: hold right-click while plotting to place a point at any height
Clothoid transitions at the entry and exit of every curve, so curvature ramps smoothly instead of jumping straight to full arc radius
Hairpin merging: overlapping rounded corners resolve into a clean hairpin instead of breaking
Custom curvature mode rebuilt with speed-driven geometry: arcs widen at higher design speeds and tighten at lower ones
B-Spline elevation interpolation for smoother grade transitions
Axis-lock point editing: lock movement to a single axis when adjusting a placed point
Distance readout in the plotting dock showing total road length as you place points
Expandable warnings with a pin highlight on the exact point causing a tight-curve issue
All docks unified under a dark charcoal theme with animated status banners and warning rows
Help dock redesigned with a tabbed layout covering Workflow, Terminology, Warnings, Road Styles, and Credits
Improved: Superelevation transitions smoother and more consistent: overlapping zones blend instead of creasing, and S-curve reversals begin earlier
Banking amplitude increased for more visible road lean at typical design speeds
Unsaved changes indicator in Road Styles so it's clear when settings haven't been applied
Fixed: Crash when clicking an existing road to start a new one
Selection highlights lingering on roads after entering or exiting an edit mode
Road Styles section blockers pushing content down instead of overlaying it

New: Point-and-click road placement: click points in the world to define the alignment, with a live curve preview as you plot
Point editor: drag placed points with 3D handles to refine the path after initial placement
Road Styles dock: save and load road configurations so settings can be reused across builds
Road connector: snap a new road onto the end of an existing one to continue an alignment
